content:
This page displays the output of .Date.Format and time.Format depending on the format chosen.
Format: 2006-01-02 15:04 MST<html lang="ko">frontmatter: 2006-01-02T15:04:05+09:00expected: 2006-01-02 15:04 KSToutput:.Date.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04 +0900time.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04 +0900Extra test: 2006-01-02 15:04Z07:00<html lang="ko">frontmatter: 2006-01-02T15:04:05+09:00expected: 2006-01-02 15:04+09:00output:.Date.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04+09:00time.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04+09:00
summary: This page displays the output of .Date.Format and time.Format depending on the format chosen.
title: KO: timezone abbr with offset
